text: Shehu may refer to: * Arben Shehu (born 1967), Albanian footballer * Bashkim Shehu (born 1955), Albanian writer * Mehmet Shehu (1913-1981), Albanian communist politician * Ylli Shehu (born 1966), Albanian footballer * The title of a ruler of the Borno Emirate, Nigeria * The title of a ruler of the Dikwa Emirate, Nigeria * Shehu Musa Yar'Adua, Nigerian politician, (March 5, 1943 – December 8, 1997) ==See also== * Sheikh Category:Albanian-language surnames
title: Shehu
